title: Super Affordable! Near Downtown!
posting_body: Call Apartment Guys and ask for reference #2192600.
Rehabbed Lakeshore east/South Streeterville one bedroom!
This unit features floor to ceiling windows with amazing views of the city, tenant controlled heat and central air conditioning and an updated kitchen with a dishwasher.
Located in a full amenity high-rise building with a fitness center, business center!
Walking distance to tons of area restaurants, shopping, entertainment, and much more!
Many types of cats and dogs are okay.
Prices are subject to change.***Photos may be of a similar unit.
For faster response best to call or text 773-549-3474 with reference #2192600
